title: Career Quest
subtitle: Interactive Career Bingo & Personality Round
description: Welcome to Career Quest, a dynamic event where participants dive into the world of emerging and unconventional careers through an exciting twist. This interactive experience is designed to challenge students’ curiosity and decision-making skills through career clues, strategic thinking, and a dash of self-awareness. Each participant receives a unique Career Bingo card filled with diverse career options. Career clues will be announced one by one. Match them to your card and aim for rows, corners, or a full house — just like in Tambola. After the game, participants will face a Rapid Fire Personality Round — a set of fun questions designed to give them insight into their dominant personality traits. Based on their responses, they’ll get quick feedback on the kind of careers that might match their natural inclinations.

title: Bandhanwar of Dreams
subtitle: Career Toran Craft
description: Welcome to Bandhanwar of Dreams, where imagination meets inspiration! In this fun and creative activity, students will design Career Torans or Wall Hangings, inspired by traditional festive decorations like Bandhanwars or Diwali Torans. Each toran will represent a unique and exciting career from the future! Students are required to form teams of 2 and explore a fascinating, lesser-known, or future-ready career. Each toran should include career name, a 1-line description, useful skills and subjects, creative designs, and a slogan or tagline. Students are requested to research the career of their choice and bring the required material for the competition.

title: Career Day
subtitle: Expert Talks & Career Exploration
description: Step into the world of possibilities at Expert Talks & Career Day — a unique opportunity for students to connect directly with industry professionals from a variety of fields. Through engaging talks, interactive Q&A sessions, and small-group discussions, students will gain first-hand insights into career pathways, required skills, and real-world challenges. The event is designed to broaden horizons, break stereotypes, and help students make informed academic and career choices. From creative industries to cutting-edge technology, finance to healthcare, each session will spark curiosity and encourage goal-oriented planning.

title: Campus Communiqué
subtitle: The Professional Skills Challenge
description: Step into the world of professional communication and career readiness! Campus Communiqué is a high-energy, three-round competition that tests how well students present themselves, both in person and on paper, and how they collaborate in high-pressure discussions. Participants will showcase their introduction skills, resume-building expertise, and group discussion ability — all essential tools for future academic and career success.

title: Passion Quest
subtitle: Career Treasure Hunt
description: Welcome to Passion Quest — an exciting treasure hunt with a twist! Students will work in teams to navigate a trail of career-themed clues hidden across the school. Each clue will lead to a new location, where the team must solve a short puzzle, riddle, or mini-task related to an emerging career. The hunt will challenge participants to think creatively, work together, and learn about fascinating careers of the future all while racing against time!

title: FutureScapes
subtitle: Creative Career Presentations
description: Welcome to FutureScapes, where students step into tomorrow’s world and bring it alive today! In this high-energy speaker series, participants will research and present on cutting-edge, emerging fields — but with a creative twist. Forget boring lectures — we’re talking sci-fi movie trailers, meme-packed PowerPoints, live futuristic skits, or even mock late-night talk shows. Students will have just 2 minutes to wow the audience with their bold visions of the future. Bonus points if you make them believe they’ll be working on Mars soon!
